text: Ezɨ ighiaba banger gumaziba kar Asapɨn ovavir boriba, me Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn uan danganibar tuivighav iti, mati Atrivim Devit ko, Asap ko, Heman ko, atrivimɨn akam inigha izir gumazim Jedutun, fomɨra me mɨkemezɨ moghɨn ami. Ezɨ Livain maba Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn tiar akabar garir ingangarim gamua vaghvagha tiar akabar gara iti. Ezɨ Livain igharaziba me bagha asɨzir tuziba tue. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, tiar akabar garir gumazir kaba ingangarir danganiba ataghɨraghsɨ nɨghnɨghan kogham.
